column4: i have to ask the obvious question , after editing grub.cfg did you sudo update-grub ?
how many kernels and partitions do you have listed ...you may just have to scroll down the menu to find the hidden ones if you have more than 6 or 7
not sure , I'm using ext4 , check this out , http://www.linux-archive.org/ubuntu-user/271959-when-installing-ubuntu-9-10-karmic-koala-will-grub2-work-together-grub-legacy.html
